name: Star Ocean 5
description:
Star Ocean 5 is a RPG game developed by Tri-Ace. It was originally released in 2016. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Star Ocean 5 on PlayStation 3.
Shuichi Kobayashi produced the game. It was directed by Hiroshi Ogawa. Motoi Sakuraba scored the game.
